column4: ok guys, please can you help me with this, heres my nic lspci
http://ubuntu.pastebin.com/445864
What is the issue?
I noticed that.
it apparently doesn't know it is a NIC... Maybe you need to load some kernel module...
First, we need to find out what the module for your card is.
ok let me see if i can find one, ill let you know when i have one
the tulip driver was removed
apparently the tulip driver is in the kernel source that i downloaded
by telling you that... it means i dont know what to do next :P
i dont know
sudo modprobe tulip in a terminal.
check the details for the card again...
looks the same
odd. I don't know anything about these linksys cards.
the reason im using this card, is because my realtek card wasnt being detected either
do you know more about the RTL8139 cards ?
yes.
RTL8139s are what I use.
yes. There must be a driver for it _somewhere_...
i know it's supposed to
how ar you going?
